import base64, json, requests

# Create a minimal valid JPEG using PIL
from PIL import Image
import io

img = Image.new\(''RGB'', \(100, 100\), color=''red''\)
buf = io.BytesIO\(\)
img.save\(buf, format=''JPEG''\)
b64 = base64.b64encode\(buf.getvalue\(\)\).decode\(\)

policy = {
    ''rules'': [{''type'': ''badge'', ''description'': ''Detect people who has TreeHacks badge'', ''severity'': ''high'', ''frequency'': ''always'', ''frequency_count'': 1}],
    ''custom_prompt'': '''',
    ''include_audio'': False,
    ''reference_images'': [],
    ''enabled_reference_ids'': [],
    ''prior_context'': ''''
}

resp = requests.post\(''http://127.0.0.1:8000/analyze/frame'', json={
    ''image_base64'': b64,
    ''policy_json'': json.dumps\(policy\)
}, timeout=30\)

print\(f''Status: {resp.status_code}''\)
data = resp.json\(\)
print\(f''Response status: {data[""status""]}''\)
if data.get\(''report''\):
    print\(f''Report summary: {data[""report""][""summary""]}''\)
    print\(f''Overall compliant: {data[""report""][""overall_compliant""]}''\)
    print\(f''Verdicts: {len\(data[""report""][""all_verdicts""]\)}''\)
    print\(f''Person summaries: {len\(data[""report""][""person_summaries""]\)}''\)
else:
    print\(f''Error: {data.get\(""error""\)}''\)
")
